name: PG GLANDS & METRIC GLANDS WITH LOCK NUT
description: A Pipe gland is a mechanical device used to secure and seal the end of an electrical cable to equipment or machinery, preventing the entry of dirt, dust, water, and other contaminants. It also ensures that the cable remains securely attached and insulated, providing strain relief to avoid damage from excessive pulling or bending.
